text.title: Clustered build servers!
text.heading: zapperfly-asm
text.subheading: A build server with a little oumph.

feature1.title: Fast
feature1.content: Zapperfly is fast! We use hazelcast for clustering and storing logs in memory. Scales to hundreds of nodes without issues.

feature2.title: Simple
feature2.content: User friendly and modern interface ensures our users stay happy.

feature3.title: Customizable
feature3.content: A small application makes it easy for developers to create their own integrations without relying on third parties.

instructions.start: Setting up your own cluster is easy, simply start the application with,
instructions.end: This starts the server with the management website enabled and the default cluster group.
